tool_description: Fast and Reliable Domain Name searches, domain availability, validation, expiration, prices, WHOIS, quality aspects and more data available on https://domains.google.
name: Domain Name Search
title: Domain Name Search

api_list.name: Whois

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain for which to perform WHOIS.

api_list.name: Domain Availability
api_list.description: Check domain availability, including domain validation, expiration, prices, domain quality aspects (advantages / considerations) and more data.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain for which to get availability info.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Set the currency for domain pricing. Specified as ISO 4217 currency code (e.g. GBP), For the full list of currency codes, see: [ISO 4217 currency codes](https://www.iban.com/currency-codes).

api_list.name: Domain Search
api_list.description: Search for domains by keyword / query. Supports all 341 TLDs available on Google Domains. Each result includes availability information, pricing, quality aspects and more data available on Google Domains.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Set the currency for domain pricing. Specified as ISO 4217 currency code (e.g. GBP), For the full list of currency codes, see: [ISO 4217 currency codes](https://www.iban.com/currency-codes).

optional_parameters.name: tlds
optional_parameters.description:
TLDs to include in the search results, specified as a comma (,) separated list of TLDs.

**e.g.** *com*
**e.g.** *dev,info,net*

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description: Return available domains up to a certain price, specified in the currency value of the `currency` parameter.
